parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.93</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - ListNBox </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets tooltip on the item with the given row and column of the 2D listbox.<br><br> 
<template lineStart="1"><title>Important </title><part><name index="1"/><value> While it is possible to set tooltip on any column, only tooltip from the primary column 0 is displayed for the whole row under cursor, which makes adding tooltips to columns other than 0 impractical. </value></part></template></value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value>  [[lnbSetTooltip]] [idc, [row, column], text] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [idc, [row, column], text]: [[Array]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> [row, column]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> row: [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p5</name>=<value> column: [[Number]] - pretty much always 0, see description note </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER5</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p6</name>=<value> text: [[String]] - tooltip to add </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER6</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 

__________________________________________________________________________________________


</value></part><part><name> s2</name>=<value> ctrl [[lnbSetTooltip]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[row, column], text] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> ctrl: [[Control]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER21</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[row, column], text]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name> Parameter22</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> [row, column]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER23</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p24</name>=<value> row: [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER24</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p25</name>=<value> column: [[Number]] - pretty much always 0, see description note</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER25</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p26</name>=<value> text: [[String]] - tooltip to add </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER26</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE2</name>=<value> 

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[lnbSetTooltip]] [1234, [1,0], "tip"];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_ctrl [[lnbSetTooltip]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[3,0], "top"];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[lbSetTooltip]], [[lnbSetData]], [[lnbAddArray]], [[lnbAddColumn]], [[lnbAddRow]], [[lnbClear]], [[lnbColor]], [[lnbCurSelRow]], [[lnbData]], [[lnbDeleteColumn]], [[lnbDeleteRow]], [[lnbGetColumnsPosition]], [[lnbPicture]], [[lnbSetColor]], [[lnbSetColumnsPos]], [[lnbSetCurSelRow]], [[lnbSetPicture]], [[lnbSetText]], [[lnbSetValue]], [[lnbSize]], [[lnbText]], [[lnbValue]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value>
